To Abû Bukair - may God preserve him -
In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful!
Ḥasan ibn Dâwud.
May God protect thee and may He cause (us) to profit by thee.
In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful!
Hand over to Nuṣair, the servant, for
balancing his (legal) claim dînâr 1/6, a sixth,
please God. And it has been written on the
3rd Epiphi of the year 200.
To Abû Bukair
Dînâr 1/6, a sixth
year 200.
